subject: Collected Miscellany - "Gaming: A Roaring Dance in Misty Hues" | Genshin Impact
content:
Spewing smoke and belching haze the golden beast emerges, the air thick with the rhythmic din of drum and gong. Such is the extraordinary atmosphere that Gaming conjures up, all in the short space of a single Wushou Dance.

Yet Gaming's enthusiasm stems from no fleeting interest, but a passion — and one that will bring lasting fortune.
contentOriginal:
Spewing smoke and belching haze the golden beast emerges, the air thick with the rhythmic din of drum and gong. Such is the extraordinary atmosphere that Gaming conjures up, all in the short space of a single Wushou Dance.

Yet Gaming's enthusiasm stems from no fleeting interest, but a passion — and one that will bring lasting fortune.

subject: Cat's Tail Gathering S2 Tournament 2024 Now Open for Registration!
content:
⭐ A cup of hot tea is perfect when you're playing cards!

Travelers, the HoYoverse-authorized, Tavern-hosted Cat's Tail Gathering Genius Invokation TCG S2 Tournament 2024 is officially open for registration!

Register to enter the tournament for a chance to win Primogems and event-exclusive card backs~


>>>Registration Link <<<



〓Registration Process〓


1.Participants must first join the [Genshin Impact Tavern] Discord server

2. Go to the #Register channel under the "Cat's Tail Gathering" category.

3. Click Register and fill out your registration information to participate in the event.

4. If you have any questions, please check the #tournament-faq channel for FAQs or post your questions in the #cats-tail-discussions channel.

*Check out the video below to learn how to register and participate in the event.

How to Participate >>>




〓Registration Period〓

From now – February 18, 23:59:59 (UTC+8)


〓Duration of Preliminary Phase〓

February 19 – February 25


〓Elimination Tournament Duration〓

March 4 – March 10

*The maximum number of people that can register for this event is 6,000, so be quick and don't miss out!



〓Preliminary Rewards〓


Victories: The number of victories that players have won in the preliminary.

Primogem Reward Per Victory: The number of Primogems that players can win for each individual victory.

*Primogem rewards in this event will provided by HoYoverse and will be sent to the winner's in-game mailbox within 30 business days after the event ends.

Card Back Reward

○ Achieve 3 victories in S2 of the 2024 season to get "The Chasm: Blue Crystal"

*Card Back rewards are exclusive rewards provided by HoYoverse for specific competitions. They cannot be obtained via any other channels except these competitions.



〓Prizes〓


Champion: 1000 USD

First Runner-Up: 600 USD

Second Runner-Up: 300 USD

Fourth Place: 100 USD

Fifth – Eighth Place: 50 USD

*Travelers will be divided based on the servers their game accounts are from (Asia, America, Europe Servers). Each server has its own prize pool.



〓Annual Tournament Scoring System〓


Starting in 2024, the winners of each server of each season will obtain corresponding "Cat's Tail Points". The "Cat's Tail Leaderboard" will display the total points of each season by server.

The "Cat's Tail Leaderboard" will also serve as a basis for future participation in "The Prince Cup"* tournament series organized by HoYoverse. The "Cat's Tail Leaderboard" will be updated regularly according to the annual event schedule.

● "Cat's Tail Points" Score System - Independent for each season/server:

○ Champion: 130 points

○ Runner-Up: 70 points

○ 2nd Runner-Up: 40 points

○ 4th Place: 25 points

○ 5th to 8th: 15 points

○ 9th to 16th: 10 points

○ 17th to 32nd: 5 points

○ Basic Participation Score (did not qualify, but participated in 35 full matches): 1 point

○ Example: A competitor was champion in S1 on the America Server, and participated in 35 full matches in S2 on the America Server, but did not qualify. This player's current score on the "America Server - Cat's Tail Leaderboard" is 36 points.

● As of the end of "Cat's Tail Gathering S2":

Asia Server Cat's Tail Leaderboard: Top 48;

Europe Server Cat's Tail Leaderboard: Top 24;

America Server Cat's Tail Leaderboard: Top 24;

will advance straight to "Cat's Tail Gathering: Serious Showdown - Spring" held in March to fight for the crown.

● *More details about the next tournament in "The Prince Cup" series will be revealed in March.

● For more details about the "Cat's Tail Leaderboard" and "Cat's Tail Gathering: Serious Showdown," please go to https://discord.gg/genshinimpacttavern.



〓Eligibility〓


1. Participants must reach Genius Invokation TCG Player Level 4 or higher.

2. Participants must be able to stream on Discord and record their screens. (The last phase of the Elimination Tournament will be recorded.)

3. Participants must join the Genshin Impact Tavern Discord Server.

*Server Link:https://discord.gg/genshinimpacttavern



〓Contest Format〓


1. Preliminary: BO1, no limitation on Decks.

2. Elimination Tournament: BO3. After reaching the Knockout Stage, the competition will use the Conquest format. If you win a match, the Character Cards you used for that match will be unavailable for the rest of the current round of matches. On the other hand, if you lose or draw a match, you will be able to use the same Character Cards again in the current round.



〓Cat's Tail Gathering Q&A〓


1. What is "Cat's Tail Gathering"?

The "Cat's Tail Gathering" is a Genius Invokation TCG competition organized by the Genshin Impact Tavern community and authorized by HoYoverse. Participants will accrue points through matches. During the one-week-long Preliminary, participants will match with other contenders multiple times, and winners will accumulate points over the course. The top 16 will enter the Elimination Tournament to contest for the championship and the grand prizes!


2. Who are eligible to participate in the "Cat's Tail Gathering" competition?

The "Cat's Tail Gathering" Genius Invokation TCG Community Competition is available to all Travelers. Reach Player Level 4 or higher and join the Genshin Impact Tavern Discord Community to register!


3. What's the relationship between the Cat's Tail Gathering and the "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup"?

"Cat's Tail Gathering" is a part of the "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup." Participants who stand out in the "Cat's Tail Gathering" Community Competition will have the chance to be invited to the "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup"!

subject: Delight Among the Clouds
content:
A new year begins, bringing the cycle of seasons back to its origin.


Come check out your keywords for this year!


We've also prepared a redemption code for you. Don't forget to redeem it as soon as possible~

A new year begins, bringing the cycle of seasons back to its origin.


Come check out your keywords for this year!


We've also prepared a redemption code for you. Don't forget to redeem it as soon as possible~

subject: Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Cutscene Animation: "Kites in the Wind" | Genshin Impact
content:
It isn't often that the air is filled with such joy, festive occasions like this being few and far between. Once the fireworks are over and the decorations packed away, who's to say when we'll all meet again?

If we could only ask the wind that blows before spring's arrival, it might tell us when those that wander shall return once more, and how they'll converse under another bright moon.
contentOriginal:
It isn't often that the air is filled with such joy, festive occasions like this being few and far between. Once the fireworks are over and the decorations packed away, who's to say when we'll all meet again?

If we could only ask the wind that blows before spring's arrival, it might tell us when those that wander shall return once more, and how they'll converse under another bright moon.

subject: Genshin Impact "Dancing Beasts and Soaring Kites" Web Event Wallpapers Showcase
content:
Hello, Travelers! Paimon has prepared web event wallpapers from "Dancing Beasts and Soaring Kites" for you to use~ Come grab your favorites now!


Click the link to download the wallpapers in different dimensions!

https://hoyo.link/4lDhFBAL


Dancing beasts to wave in the new, and soaring kites for blessings too!

The Lantern Rite is here, bringing happiness, prosperity, and good fortune~


Go to the "Dancing Beasts and Soaring Kites" Web Event



I. Dancing Beasts to Wave in the New: Gaming


II. Soaring Kites for Blessings Too: Xianyun

III. Jade Pendants and Vistas of Moonlit Hills: Lynette

IV: Wafting Aromas From Chenyu Vale: Lyney and Freminet

V. Dancing Beasts to Meet the Spring Breeze: Gaming, Paimon, Man Chai

subject: Rise of the Auspicious Beast: A Behind the Scenes Look at the Creation of Gaming | Genshin Impact
content:
On the one hand, a widely traveled guard; on the other, a highly skilled Wushou dancer.

Constantly on the move, his days are long, arduous, and full of challenges — yet his passion for Wushou Dance has never waned.

Let's take a look at how the Genshin Impact team brought Gaming to life!
contentOriginal:
On the one hand, a widely traveled guard; on the other, a highly skilled Wushou dancer.

Constantly on the move, his days are long, arduous, and full of challenges — yet his passion for Wushou Dance has never waned.

Let's take a look at how the Genshin Impact team brought Gaming to life!

subject: Genshin Impact Character Stickers
content:
Hello, Travelers! Paimon has prepared a series of Genshin Impact Character Stickers. Feel free to use them!



This couplet's for none other than our illustrious Captain Beidou. Naturally, I would have to think of something extraordinary.


Food's ready! Relax, Chongyun — this dish isn't spicy in the slightest. Try it and you'll see!


One's Supreme Cuisine Machine makes cooking a breeze, so let one know if there's anything else you'd like.


That special time of year has descended upon us once more. Let us enjoy the enchanting sights of the Lantern Rite together.


It's not often that I get to let my hair down like this, so no discussion of business tonight. Are these snacks to your liking?


Dr. Baizhu, can you keep up with us? Yaoyao, let's wait for him here.


Thanks for coming to watch my performance! Let's all have a midnight snack together after the show!
contentOriginal:
Hello, Travelers! Paimon has prepared a series of Genshin Impact Character Stickers. Feel free to use them!



This couplet's for none other than our illustrious Captain Beidou. Naturally, I would have to think of something extraordinary.


Food's ready! Relax, Chongyun — this dish isn't spicy in the slightest. Try it and you'll see!


One's Supreme Cuisine Machine makes cooking a breeze, so let one know if there's anything else you'd like.


That special time of year has descended upon us once more. Let us enjoy the enchanting sights of the Lantern Rite together.


It's not often that I get to let my hair down like this, so no discussion of business tonight. Are these snacks to your liking?


Dr. Baizhu, can you keep up with us? Yaoyao, let's wait for him here.


Thanks for coming to watch my performance! Let's all have a midnight snack together after the show!
